verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that Moses <S%H4872><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and the elders <S%H2205><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%>

And he said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> you a young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> calf <S%H5695><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and a ram <S%H352><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, without <S%H8549><s%> blemish, <S%H8549><s%> and offer <S%H7126><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> you shall speak, <S%H1696><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> you a kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering; and a calf <S%H5695><s%> and a lamb, <S%H3532><s%> both of the first <S%H1121><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish, <S%H8549><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering;

Also a bullock <S%H7794><s%> and a ram <S%H352><s%> for peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, to sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil: <S%H8081><s%> for to day <S%H3117><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will appear <S%H7200><s%> to you.

And they brought <S%H3947><s%> that which <S%H834><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> before <S%H413><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation: <S%H4150><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> drew near <S%H7126><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> This <S%H2088><s%> is the thing <S%H1697><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> that you should do: <S%H6213><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall appear <S%H7200><s%> to you.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Go <S%H7126><s%> to the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and offer <S%H6213><s%> your sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and your burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for yourself, and for the people: <S%H5971><s%> and offer <S%H6213><s%> the offering <S%H7133><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> and make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for them; as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded. <S%H6680><s%>
Aaron <S%H175><s%> therefore went <S%H7126><s%> to the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and slew <S%H7819><s%> the calf <S%H5695><s%> of the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, which <S%H834><s%> was for himself.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> the blood <S%H1818><s%> to him: and he dipped <S%H2881><s%> his finger <S%H676><s%> in the blood, <S%H1818><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> it on the horns <S%H7161><s%> of the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and poured <S%H3332><s%> out the blood <S%H1818><s%> at <S%H413><s%> the bottom <S%H3247><s%> of the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

But the fat, <S%H2459><s%> and the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> above <S%H4480><s%> the liver <S%H3516><s%> of the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, he burnt <S%H5930><s%> on the altar; <S%H4196><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
And the flesh <S%H1320><s%> and the hide <S%H5785><s%> he burnt <S%H8313><s%> with fire <S%H784><s%> without <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And he slew <S%H7819><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering; and Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> presented <S%H4672><s%> to him the blood, <S%H1818><s%> which he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And they presented <S%H4672><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering to him, with the pieces <S%H5409><s%> thereof, and the head: <S%H7218><s%> and he burnt <S%H6999><s%> them on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>
And he did wash <S%H7364><s%> the inwards <S%H7130><s%> and the legs, <S%H3767><s%> and burnt <S%H6999><s%> them on the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering on the altar. <S%H4196><s%>

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> the people's <S%H5971><s%> offering, <S%H7133><s%> and took <S%H3947><s%> the goat, <S%H8163><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering for the people, <S%H5971><s%> and slew <S%H7819><s%> it, and offered <S%H2398><s%> it for sin, <S%H2403><s%> as the first. <S%H7223><s%>
And he brought <S%H7126><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and offered <S%H6213><s%> it according to the manner. <S%H4941><s%>

And he brought <S%H7126><s%> the meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and took an handful <S%H4390><s%> <S%H3709><s%> thereof, and burnt <S%H6999><s%> it on the altar, <S%H4196><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> sacrifice of the morning. <S%H1242><s%>

He slew <S%H7819><s%> also the bullock <S%H7794><s%> and the ram <S%H352><s%> for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings, which <S%H834><s%> was for the people: <S%H5971><s%> and Aaron's <S%H175><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%> presented <S%H4672><s%> to him the blood, <S%H1818><s%> which he sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about,

And the fat <S%H2459><s%> of the bullock <S%H7794><s%> and of the ram, <S%H352><s%> the rump, <S%H451><s%> and that which covers <S%H4374><s%> the inwards, and the kidneys, <S%H3629><s%> and the lobe <S%H3508><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> the liver: <S%H3516><s%>
And they put <S%H7760><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> on the breasts, <S%H2373><s%> and he burnt <S%H6999><s%> the fat <S%H2459><s%> on the altar: <S%H4196><s%>

And the breasts <S%H2373><s%> and the right <S%H3225><s%> shoulder <S%H7785><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> waved <S%H5130><s%> for a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> as Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

And Aaron <S%H175><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> up his hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> and blessed <S%H1288><s%> them, and came <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from offering <S%H6213><s%> of the sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> went <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> and came <S%H3318><s%> out, and blessed <S%H1288><s%> the people: <S%H5971><s%> and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the people. <S%H5971><s%>

And there came <S%H3318><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> out from before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering and the fat: <S%H2459><s%> which when all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> saw, <S%H7200><s%> they shouted, <S%H7442><s%> and fell <S%H5307><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> their faces. <S%H6440><s%>
